duties_responsibilities.duty: Contribute to the planning, design, permitting, and implementation of engineering projects in the renewable energy and power sectors.
Generate and review equipment drawings and specifications for renewable energy system components.
Prepare electrical designs, including electrical loading and equipment sizing calculations.
Provide technical expertise to navigate permitting challenges in the renewable energy and power sectors.
Prepare technical proposals and participate in business development with existing clients and identified leads.
Conduct field investigations, construction oversight, and quality assurance activities.
Lead, manage performance, hire and retain personnel for overall success of the technical team.

education_certification.credential: B.S. and/or M.S. in Electrical Engineering, with a focus on electrical
